tool.name: CalculateFields

param.name: Feature Class
param.dialogReference: Select a feature class or table from which the field calculation will be performed.

param.name: Join Field
param.dialogReference: Select the field which contains a unique ID for each item in the table or feature class, such as OBJECTID or Forest_ID.

param.name: Update Field
param.displayname: Select the Field to be Updated
param.dialogReference: Select the field which will be updated with new values.

param.name: Value Field
param.displayname: Select the Field With the Update Value
param.dialogReference: Select the field which contains the values that will be used to update the previously entered field.

param.name: SQL Query
param.displayname: Optional SQL Query to Perform Before Field Calculation
param.dialogReference: An optional SQL query that will allow you to make selections so only certain records will have field calculations performed on them. E.g., "Elevation >4000", will result in a selection of records that have elevation greater than 4000 and only these records will have a field calculation performed on them.

tool.summary:
This tool is designed for field calculations between attribute fields that are within the same attribute table.

For further information about the NRGG Field Calculator toolbox please contact the Northern Region Geospatial Group, GIS Program Manager, 406-329-3511.
